original_text:
Big Win 777
Non sempre si cercano le Slot Machine più popolari. Alcune volte vogliamo rivivere le trame di film famosi o di romanzi che hanno fatto la storia mentre scommetti i tuoi soldi, ma altre volte vogliamo solo una Slot Machine stile Las Vegas in cui vincere un sacco di soldi senza troppi personaggi o troppe funzioni strane e incomprensibili.
In mezzo a tutte queste Slot Machine si perde l’identità dei casinò fisici, che da sempre hanno affascinato le persone in tutto il mondo. Se vuoi riprendere questa modalità vintage, ti suggeriamo di continuare a leggere.

Una grafica vintage
Big Win 777 è una Slot Machine prodotta dalla casa di produzione chiamata Play N Go. Si tratta di un produttore che fornisce le Slot con la maggior percentuale di payout, ma di questo ti parleremo più avanti nella sezione legata alle funzioni.
I simboli sono quelli delle tradizionali Slot Machine, con i 7 colorati, i simboli BAR e alcuni simboli speciali che approfondiremo nel prossimo paragrafo.
La cosa bella è che vengono riprodotte tutte quelle lucine che invadono gli ambienti dei casinò di Las Vegas e che riescono ad incantare tutti.
Dietro la griglia 5×3 ci sono colonne come quelle che anticipano l’ingresso ad una sala da gioco americana, mentre tra un rullo e l’altro ci sono delle lucine che percorrono gli spazi che separano in verticale. Per quanto si tratti di una grafica ammaliante, devi ancora conoscere le funzioni!

Chance Wheel e altre funzioni
Big Win 777 di Play N Go è sicuramente una slot tradizionale e si nota soprattutto per i simboli. Le funzioni, allo stesso modo, sono poche ma estremamente interessanti e accattivanti.
Nei rulli potrai trovare un simbolo Wild, rappresentato dal diamante, che permette di sostituire l’elemento mancante all’interno di una delle linee di pagamento per ottenere una combinazione vincente.
Lo Scatter, invece, è la ruota della fortuna, una delle modalità più emozionanti che abbiamo mai provato giocando alle Slot online.
Proprio ottenendo tre scatter in fila, potrai sbloccare la funzione più interessante del gioco, ossia la Wheel Chance. Si tratta di una specie di ruota della fortuna che ti permette di vincere un sacco di soldi. Pensa, potrai ottenere anche un moltiplicatore pari a 777x!
Gli altri simboli possono rappresentare dei moltiplicatori interessanti. Con il 7 rosso, infatti, potrai moltiplicare la tua vincita da 2x fino a 5x, cosa che, solitamente, ti permette di guadagnare anche 1200 euro!
Il 7 dorato, invece, ti garantisce vincite fino all’ottima somma di 1500 euro in crediti di gioco.

Altre Slot Machine simili
Se ti piacciono le Slot Machine tradizionali ma con una grafica rivisitata e migliorata, come nel caso di Big Win 777 di Play N Go, la scelta su Internet è molto ampia e valida. Potresti provare Slot Power Stars, la Slot prodotta da Novomatic con i suoi classici simboli della frutta; oppure Slot Joker 8000 di Microgaming, che ti permette di giocare su un simulatore di Slot Machine fisica.

raw_translation.response:
Big Win 777

As experienced gamblers, we don't always seek out the most popular slot machines. Sometimes we want to relive the plots of famous films or novels that have made history while betting our hard-earned money. However, other times we crave a Las Vegas-style slot machine where we can win heaps of money without too many characters or incomprehensible features.

Amidst all these slot machines, the identities of physical casinos, which have always fascinated people around the world, are often lost. If you want to recapture this vintage mode, we suggest you keep reading.

Vintage graphics
Big Win 777 is a slot machine produced by a studio called Play N Go. This is a producer that provides slots with the highest payout percentages, which we'll talk more about in the functions section. 

The symbols are those of traditional slot machines, with colorful "7"s, BAR symbols, and some special symbols that we'll delve into in the next paragraph. What's beautiful is that all those twinkling lights that invade Las Vegas casinos are reproduced, enchanting us all. Behind the 5x3 grid are columns that anticipate entering an American game room while lights run between the reels. Although the graphics are entrancing, you still need to know the functions!

Chance Wheel and other features
Big Win 777 by Play N Go is certainly a traditional slot machine and is characterized mainly by its symbols. The features are few but extremely interesting and captivating.

In the reels, you'll find a Wild symbol, the diamond, which allows you to replace the missing elements to obtain a winning combination. 

The Scatter, instead, is the Wheel of Fortune, one of the most exciting features we've ever played in an online slot.

By getting three scatters in a row, you can unlock the most interesting feature of the game, namely the Chance Wheel. It's a type of wheel of fortune that allows you to win heaps of money. Imagine, you can even get a multiplier of up to 777x!

The other symbols can represent interesting multipliers. With the red "7," for example, you can multiply your winnings from 2x to 5x, which usually allows you to earn up to 1200 euros! 

The golden "7," on the other hand, guarantees you winnings of up to an excellent sum of 1500 euros in game credits.

Similar slot machines
If you like traditional slot machines with a revisited and improved graphic, like Big Win 777 by Play N Go, the choice on the Internet is vast and valid. You could try Slot Power Stars, the slot produced by Novomatic with its classic fruit symbols, or Slot Joker 8000 by Microgaming, which allows you to play on a physical slot machine simulator.

Gameplay Features

Big Win 777 is a traditional slot machine produced by Play N Go. The 5x3 grid features symbols like colorful 7s and BARs. The game offers a Wild symbol (the diamond) and a Scatter symbol (the Wheel of Fortune). The Chance Wheel feature can be activated by getting three Scatters in a row. Other symbols offer interesting multipliers.

Graphics

Big Win 777 features vintage graphics that reproduce the twinkling lights of Las Vegas casinos. The 5x3 grid is set against columns and lights that anticipate entering an American game room. The symbols are those of classic slot machines, including 7s and BARs.

Payouts

Play N Go is a producer that provides slots with the highest payout percentages. Big Win 777 offers some interesting payout opportunities, including a maximum multiplier of up to 777x. The red 7 offers winnings of up to 1200 euros, while the golden 7 offers winnings of up to 1500 euros in game credits.

Similar Slot Games

If you enjoy traditional slot machines with a revisited graphic, options like Slot Power Stars by Novomatic or Slot Joker 8000 by Microgaming may appeal to you. Both games feature classic fruit symbols and physical slot machine simulators.

Developer - Play N Go

Play N Go is a slot game producer known for providing games with high payout percentages. Their games are often characterized by traditional slot machine symbols and revisited graphics. Big Win 777 is an example of a simple yet captivating slot game produced by Play N Go.

Review: Big Win 777

As experienced gamblers, we don't always seek out the most popular slot machines. Sometimes we want to relive the plots of famous films or novels that have made history while betting our hard-earned money. However, other times we crave a Las Vegas-style slot machine where we can win heaps of money without too many characters or incomprehensible features.

Amidst all these slot machines, the identities of physical casinos, which have always fascinated people around the world, are often lost. If you want to recapture this vintage mode, we suggest you keep reading.

Vintage graphics
Big Win 777 is a slot machine produced by a studio called Play N Go. This is a producer that provides slots with the highest payout percentages, which we'll talk more about in the functions section. 

The symbols are those of traditional slot machines, with colorful "7"s, BAR symbols, and some special symbols that we'll delve into in the next paragraph. What's beautiful is that all those twinkling lights that invade Las Vegas casinos are reproduced, enchanting us all. Behind the 5x3 grid are columns that anticipate entering an American game room while lights run between the reels. Although the graphics are entrancing, you still need to know the functions!

Chance Wheel and other features
Big Win 777 by Play N Go is certainly a traditional slot machine and is characterized mainly by its symbols. The features are few but extremely interesting and captivating.

In the reels, you'll find a Wild symbol, the diamond, which allows you to replace the missing elements to obtain a winning combination. 

The Scatter, instead, is the Wheel of Fortune, one of the most exciting features we've ever played in an online slot.

By getting three scatters in a row, you can unlock the most interesting feature of the game, namely the Chance Wheel. It's a type of wheel of fortune that allows you to win heaps of money. Imagine, you can even get a multiplier of up to 777x!

The other symbols can represent interesting multipliers. With the red "7," for example, you can multiply your winnings from 2x to 5x, which usually allows you to earn up to 1200 euros! 

The golden "7," on the other hand, guarantees you winnings of up to an excellent sum of 1500 euros in game credits.

Similar slot machines
If you like traditional slot machines with a revisited and improved graphic, like Big Win 777 by Play N Go, the choice on the Internet is vast and valid. You could try Slot Power Stars, the slot produced by Novomatic with its classic fruit symbols, or Slot Joker 8000 by Microgaming, which allows you to play on a physical slot machine simulator.
